body.p: Let Henry Metcalf off. It is right He is a clever man & has a large family to support. He has paid the fees & costs & this was hard on him -- He deserves clemency & will sin no more if sin he did -- This I mention is the sentiment of a large body of our people -- I earnestly recommend his pardon --

Franklin Cir Ct
vs
H, C. Metcalf
2 Judgts
$500, each
Remit
Dealing Faro
10th Nov/64
